subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In many ways, this season began when the 11-5 Giants were embarrassed by the Panthers during last season's playoffs. Coach Tom Coughlin will try to use that loss as motivation this Sunday against Carolina.
snippet: In many ways, this season began when the 11-5 Giants were embarrassed by the Panthers during last season's playoffs. Coach Tom Coughlin will try to use that loss as motivation this Sunday against Carolina.
